COMMAND STRUCTURE
=================

neural-trader package <subcommand> [args] [options]

Subcommands:
  list [category]     - List packages (filter by category)
  info <name>         - Show detailed package information
  install <name>      - Install package with dependencies
  update [name]       - Update one or all packages
  remove <name>       - Remove package (with dep checking)
  search <query>      - Search packages by keyword

Aliases:
  package → pkg
  list → ls
  info → show
  install → add, i
  update → upgrade, up
  remove → uninstall, rm
  search → find

✓ Rich UI with chalk colors and cli-table3 tables

INTEGRATION
===========

To integrate with main CLI (bin/cli.js):

const packageCommand = require('../src/cli/commands/package');

const commands = {
  // existing commands...
  
  package: async (...args) => {
    const options = parseOptions(args);
    await packageCommand(args.filter(a => !a.startsWith('--')), options);
  },
  
  pkg: async (...args) => {
    // Alias for package
    return commands.package(...args);
  }
};
